author: Al-Qattan, MM
adress: King Saud Univ, Div Plast & Hand Surg, Dept Surg, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia
title: A Review of the Phenotype of Synpolydactyly Type 1 in Homozygous Patients: Defining the Relatively Long and Medially Deviated Big Toe with/without Cupping of the Forefoot as a Pathognomonic Feature in the Phenotype
